title: Introduction to Neural Networks and PyTorch
about: Introduction to neural networks and deep learning using PyTorch. Learn to build, train, and evaluate neural networks.

topics.name: PyTorch Basics
topics.details: Getting started with tensors and basic operations in PyTorch.

topics.name: Building Neural Networks
topics.details: Constructing neural networks from scratch using PyTorch.

topics.name: Training and Evaluation
topics.details: Training models and evaluating their performance.

summary: This module introduces neural networks and deep learning using PyTorch, focusing on model construction, training, and evaluation.
